data.html:
u0022

The Brief

We were approached by the client to design an app which Tenants, Landlords and Service Providers could use as a forum and middleman to raise issues, confirm any repairs, get quotes and confirm the repair is complete.

The project would include UX research, the creation of the companyu2019s brand identity, an the first iteration of the product and UI guidelines.

Team: Lucy Coker, Liz Mueller (UI), Nazira Lakhoo, Greg Llisicki (UX)

Project time: 3 week sprint

Tools: Sketch, Illustrator, Photoshop, InVision

Kick-off Meeting

During our first meeting with the client, we took the opportunity to learn where the idea had come from and dissect the project brief. Since they had laid out a large number of functions this allowed us to discern which elements were the most important for the MVP u2014 u2018must havesu2019 vs. u2018nice to havesu2019.

We also took the opportunity to do a gut test of screen layouts, logos and iconography from similar apps. The clientu2019s feedback gave us a good feel for their current vision of how the App might look and feel.
